Text: Gulf South FT Open SeasonPST Due to the level of interest in Kosciusko and Holmesville capacity Gulf South will be holding an Open Season for FT capacity pursuant to section of the Gulf South Tariff The capacity becomes available April when the existing contracts expire Gulf South is selling the capacity for a term of one year expiring March The capacity available for sale is Agua Dulce to Kosciusko Dthday Agua Dulce to Holmesville Dthday Carthage to Kosciusko Dthday Venice to Kosciusko Dthday Mobile Bay to Koscuisko Dthday Bistineau to Koscuisko Dthday Carthage to Holmesville Dthday The above capacity represents the capacity that is currently under contract on a primary firm basis The Open Season will be held on Tuesday January th at PM CCT The auction will be held on Gulf Souths web site Gulf South will post the minimum acceptable rate and supplemental rights the day before the auction commences Each package will be auctioned separately Given the bidding history on capacity offered for auction Gulf South is proposing to auction each package for an initial period of minutes with extensions if bids are received in the last seconds rather than the procedures set forth in Section The extensions will continue until the bidding stops Gulf South shall post on its Internet web site the winning bids and the winning bidders within fortyeight hours after the completion of the auction The interactive auction will eliminate the requirement of section to post the capacity for a bid period of business days Customers bids shall be for demand fees only Gulf South will entertain negotiations for multipleyear FT deals on the aforementioned capacity through Friday January pursuant to Gulf Souths current tariff provisions Any multipleyear contracts for the above capacity will be communicated on Monday January via the Gulf South web site and will be subject to the posting requirements of section of the Gulf South tariff If you need information on how to participate in the Gulf South auction please contact your account manager If you have questions about the capacity to be auctioned please contact Dwight Helms at or Patrick Howard at
